016package io.micronaut.maven.testresources;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonRootName;
021import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
022
023import static io.micronaut.maven.testresources.StopTestResourcesServerMojo.MICRONAUT_TEST_RESOURCES_KEEPALIVE;
024
025/**
026 * Base configuration class for Test Resources.
027 *
028 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
029 * @since 3.5.1
030 */
031@JsonRootName("configuration")
032@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)
033public class TestResourcesConfiguration {
034
035    public static final String DISABLED = "false";
036    public static final String CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX = "micronaut.test.resources.";
037
038    private static final String PROPERTY_ENABLED = "enabled";
039
040    /**
041     * Whether to enable or disable Micronaut test resources support.
042     */
043    @Parameter(property =  CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + PROPERTY_ENABLED, defaultValue = DISABLED)
044    @JsonProperty(PROPERTY_ENABLED)
045    protected boolean testResourcesEnabled;
046
047    /**
048     * Whether the test resources service should be shared between independent builds
049     * (e.g different projects, even built with different build tools).
050     */
051    @Parameter(property = CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + "shared", defaultValue = DISABLED)
052    protected boolean shared;
053
054    /**
055     * Whether the test resources service should be kept alive after the build.
056     */
057    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_TEST_RESOURCES_KEEPALIVE, defaultValue = DISABLED)
058    protected boolean keepAlive;
059
060    /**
061     * Allows configuring a namespace for the shared test resources server. This can be used in case it makes sense to
062     * have different instances of shared services, for example when independent builds sets share different services.
063     *
064     * @since 3.5.1
065     */
066    @Parameter(property = CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + "namespace")
067    protected String sharedServerNamespace;
068
069    /**
070     * @return Whether to enable or disable Micronaut test resources support.
071     */
072    public boolean isTestResourcesEnabled() {
073        return testResourcesEnabled;
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * @return Whether the test resources service should be shared between independent builds.
078     */
079    public boolean isShared() {
080        return shared;
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * @return Whether the test resources service should be kept alive after the build.
085     */
086    public boolean isKeepAlive() {
087        return keepAlive;
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * @return The shared server namespace (if any).
092     */
093    public String getSharedServerNamespace() {
094        return sharedServerNamespace;
095    }
096}
